ocrd-pixelclassifier-segmentation.description: Segment page into regions using a pixel classifier based on a Fully Convolutional Network (FCN)

overwrite_regions.description: remove existing layout and text annotation below the Page level

xheight.description: height of character x in pixels used during training

gpu_allow_growth.description: required for GPU use with some graphic cards (set to true, if you get CUDNN_INTERNAL_ERROR)

resize_height.description: scale down pixelclassifier output to this height for postprocessing (performance/quality tradeoff). Independent of training.
